text: Hermann Klaus Hugo Weyl, (; 9 November 1885 – 8 December 1955) was a German mathematician, theoretical physicist and philosopher. He worked at the University of Göttingen and at the Institute for Advanced Study. He was known for his works focusing on wormholes and general relativity. ==References== Category:1885 births Category:1955 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Göttingen Category:German physicists Category:German mathematicians Category:German philosophers
title: Hermann Weyl
